{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16625v1", "title": "Inducing spectral gaps for the cohomological Laplacians of
  $\operatorname{Sp}_{2n}(\mathbb{Z})$", "summary": "We show that the spectral gap of the first cohomological Laplacian $\Delta_1$
for $\operatorname{Sp}_{2n}(\mathbb{Z})$ follows once a slightly stronger
assumption holds for some $\operatorname{Sp}_{2m}(\mathbb{Z})$, where $n\geq
m$. As an application of this result, we provide explicit lower bounds for some
quotients of $\operatorname{Sp}_{2n}(\mathbb{Z})$ for any $n\geq 2$.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR,math.FA,math.OA", "published": "2025-04-23T11:31:53Z"}
